<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Cloak of Repute](/Equipment.aspx?ID=510)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This gaudy and extravagant cloak is adorned with brilliant gems and a fur trim. While wearing the cloak, you gain instant fame and notoriety, granting you a +1 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to Make an Impression. Creatures attempting to learn about you gain the same bonus to Gather Information about you.

---

The item bonus is +2. You can activate the cloak twice per day.

level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cloak of Repute (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 21,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +3. You can activate the cloak three times per day. If you roll a critical failure on your Diplomacy check when you activate the cloak, you get a failure instead.
